LanguageData.CYB_Warning_PawnWillDieFromPsyphon: {PAWN_labelShort} will die from loss of consciousness if {PAWN_possessive} psyche is drained to this degree. To psyphon this person without killing them, go back and reduce desired psyfocus.\n\nContinue anyway?
LanguageData.CYB_Warning_PawnMightDieFromPsyphon: {PAWN_labelShort} may die from brain damage if {Pawn_possessive} psyche is drained to this degree. To reduce the risk of brain damage, go back and reduce desired psyfocus.\n\nContinue anyway?
